description: Main entry point for a Flutter application setting up theme, environment, and initial UI with a home screen that checks for API key configuration.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget defining the app theme and home screen.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Stateful widget that displays the app's main interface and checks for API key configuration.

methods.name: _electricOrangeTheme
methods.description: Defines a custom dark theme with electric orange accents.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for both MyApp and HomeScreen widgets, defining UI layout.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state and checks for the presence of the OpenAI API key.
